name: Space Intruders (MichielArkema)
description:
SPACE INTRUDERS

This game is a clone from space-invaders.

I wrote this game from scratch in love2d

KNOWN BUGS:

  1. Player can go out of screen (Fixed in next version)
  2.  Player hitbox might be alittle to big (Fixed in next version)
  3. Alien movement is abit stuttering but thats just a beta yet

CONTROLS
   1. use arrow keys to move left and right , space to shoot
